## 사건 정보

**사건명**: HORWITZ Et Al. v. DICKERSON
**판결일**: 1930-01-09
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Lane

## 변호인

Baker, Botts, Parker & Garwood, Palmer Hutcheson, and Galvin Garwood, all of Houston, for appellant corporations., Winfree & Weslow and R. Edward Mooney, all of Houston, for appellant Horwitz., J. S. Bracewell and Quinton Wright, both of Houston, for appellee.

## 인용

- 25 S.W.2d 966

## 판결문 요약

This suit was brought by appellee, George Dickerson, against appellant Will Horwitz, individually, Horwitz Texas Theaters, Inc., and Preston Amusement Company, the latter two being corporations, to recover actual and exemplary damages for an assault alleged to have been made upon him by appellant Will Horwitz on the 10th day of November, 1928.
